name: 劉建浩
objective:
本課程主要探討高等應用統計的相關原理方法與應用案例，包括一般資料分析、信度效度、迴歸分析、主成分分析、多元尺度分析、區別分析、抽樣調查等。課程將配合個案進行討論。
The objective of this course is to help students understand the data analysis and applications. The major contents include reliability and effectiveness of data, regression analysis, principle component analysis, multi-dimensional scaling, logistic analysis and sampling analysis. The course will also include some practical example discussions.
schedule:
第 1 週  	信度與效度 (Reliability and Validity)
第 2 週		兩變數關連分析 (Correlation)
第 3 週		平均數比較分析 (ANOVA)
第 4-5 週		主成分分析 (Principal Component Analysis)
第 6-8 週 	        集群分析 (Cluster Analysis)
第 9 週		期中測驗 (上機考試)(Mid-term test)
第 10 週		多元尺度法 (MDS)
第 11 週		區別分析 (羅吉特分析)(Logistic analysis)
第 12-13 週	迴歸分析 (Regression analysis)
第 14-17 週	結構方程模式 (Structural Equation Modeling)
第 18 週		期末考試 (Final Test)
scorePolicy:
期中考 (mid-term Test) 30%
期末考 (Final Test) 30%
平時成績 (Quiz and Homework) 40%
consultation: This class will have a line group. Any questions can make appointment to further discuss. Every Thusady 10-12 AM at Technology Building 1124
